DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct use standardize technique collect blood sample via acute , randomize , cross-over design . Subjects provided meal day prior test participate 3 test day minimum 1 week break test day maximum time commitment 7 week . A trained phlebotomist place catheter collect blood sample antecubital vein use sterile technique .
DOC.brief_title: Optimizing Meal Snack Timing Promote Health
